scripts.build: cd client && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build-web: cd client && npm run compile-web && cd ..
scripts.copy-dl-resources: shx rm -f client/resources/* && shx mkdir -p client/resources && shx cp linked_resources/* client/resources/
scripts.build-and-copy-resources: npm run build && npm run copy-dl-resources
scripts.web-prelaunch: npm run build-and-copy-resources && cd client && npm run watch-web && cd ..
